name: Rabbit
description: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short, rounded head, four legs, and a tail.

name: Cat
description: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short, rounded head, four legs, and a tail.

name: Dog
description: A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout, an acute sense of smell, and a short, rounded head.

name: Hamster
description: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short, rounded head, four legs, and a tail.
